snippet: The fourth triennial New York Early Music Celebration, a festival of period-instrument performances, delves into Polish music of the 11th through 19th centuries.
abstract: Fourth triennial New York Early Music Celebration, festival of period-instrument performances, delves into Polish music of 11th through 19th centuries; Frederick Renz is director.
lead_paragraph: The fourth triennial New York Early Music Celebration, a festival of period-instrument performances, delves into Polish music of the 11th through 19th centuries.

headline.seo: New York Early Music Celebration Delves Into Polish Works
headline.main: Visiting a Forgotten Nest of Early European Melody
headline.print_headline: Visiting a Forgotten Nest of Early European Melody
